duties_responsibilities.duty: Receive and process prescription requests, and enter prescriptions into a computer database for dispensing.
Assist clients at the cash register and work with insurance companies for medication coverage.
Maintain inventory, profile prescriptions, and prepare medication for dispensing.
Communicate effectively and respectfully with customers and co-workers, ensuring accurate and timely information transmission.
Adhere to established policies and procedures related to communications and engage in accurate verbal and written communication.
Manage workload effectively, set priorities appropriately, and ensure accurate and efficient services through coordination with team members.
Demonstrate understanding of and compliance with policies and procedures, and maintain up-to-date knowledge of pharmacy operations.
Participate in quality assurance activities to ensure high-quality outcomes and meet customer needs consistently.
Maintain work environment and equipment according to established policies and procedures to produce safe and effective products.
Complete required training and maintain on-going certification for pharmacy-related activities.
Follow guidelines set forth in Legacy’s Values in Action and maintain current applicable state Pharmacy Technician Licensure.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required. Prior pharmacy tech/clerk experience or current pharmacy tech student or program graduate preferred. Basic familiarity with computers preferred.
